item.title: Manage external displays with Gnome and Argos extension
item.description: I wanted to easily switch between my regular desktop configuration: All the external displays: To a single external display: Or just the laptop screen: This usually required to open gnome-control-center, then click displays, etc. So I thought it would be nice to look for a extension in the Gnome Extensions site… but I couldn’t find any that worked as I wanted… so let’s try to do our own method! :)
